title: Chemical Maker Trinseo Gears Up for Debt Talks as Demand Wanes
description: Trinseo PLC is preparing to start negotiations with its creditors as the chemical company seeks to shore up its balance sheet amid slumping sales.
content: Trinseo PLC is preparing to start negotiations with its creditors as the chemical company seeks to shore up its balance sheet amid slumping sales.
